API Documentation

mt_ctdm - Multi-Task Context-Dependent Decision Making package

Framework for Esther Poniatowski’s PhD 2022-2025. The whole package performs data analysis of neuronal recordings in ferret brains, collected in two context-dependent decision making tasks.

Full package documentation at [URL].

constants

Define global constants and variables for the whole package.

mt_ctdm.constants.DATA_PATH = 'multitask_ctdm/data/'

(str) Path to the data directory.

preprocess

Functionalities for preprocessing the raw data (spiking times of single neurons).

visualize

Functionalities to visualize the results.
